definition: Four Treasures of the Study, namely 筆|笔[bi3], 墨[mo4], 紙|纸[zhi3] and 硯|砚[yan4]/the essentials of calligraphy and scholarship (idiom)
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: Inkstone is one of the four treasures, with deep cultural connotation .
sentences.chinese: 砚是文房四宝之一，有着深厚的文化内涵。

sentences.english: If you are one of the four treasures of GuYan, then you're lucky.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的文房四宝中有一方古砚，那么你就太幸运了。

sentences.english: I'd recommend you "the Four Treasures of Study".
Is listed as one of China's four treasures.
sentences.chinese: 被列为中国的文房四宝之一。

sentences.english: What are China's four treasures of study?
sentences.chinese: 什么是中国的文房四宝？

sentences.english: And China Association of absorption for the four treasures of the membership units will be closed.
sentences.chinese: 并被中国文房四宝协会吸收为会收为会员单位。

sentences.english: "Four Treasures of the Study" used by the Chinese emperor.
sentences.chinese: 图为中国皇帝书桌上的文房四宝。

sentences.english: "Four treasure of the study" Chinese culture is a special symbol.
sentences.chinese: “文房四宝”是中华文化的一种特殊象征。

sentences.english: I'd recommend you "the Four Treasures of Study" then.
sentences.chinese: 那我为您推荐“文房四宝”。

definition: high-quality ink stonemade in Duanxi and Guangdong
the strokes of a character/calligraphy and painting
fine writing paper, originally from Jing county 涇縣|泾县, Xuancheng 宣城, Anhui
checkers (board and pieces for go 圍棋|围棋 or Chinese chess 象棋 etc)
